snippet: Masahiro Tanaka will start Thursday, Mark Teixeira will play first base for the first time in almost nine months, and the team will get its first taste of the new instant replay rule.
abstract: New York Yankees acquisition Masahiro Tanaka will start in spring training game, and Mark Teixeira will play first base for the first time in almost nine months; game will also give managers chance to evaluate new instant replay rule.
lead_paragraph: Masahiro Tanaka will start Thursday, Mark Teixeira will play first base for the first time in almost nine months, and the team will get its first taste of the new instant replay rule.

headline.main: Yankees Will Assess Tanaka and Teixeira (and Technology)
headline.print_headline: A Chance to Evaluate Teixeira and Tanaka (and Technology)
